snp1.10:182:
182
			"Saddhīdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, Dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
			Saccaṁ have sādutaraṁ rasānaṁ,
			Paññājīviṁ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṁ".
snp1.10:183:
183
			"Kathaṁ su tarati oghaṁ, kathaṁ su tarati aṇṇavaṁ;
			Kathaṁ su dukkhamacceti,
			kathaṁ su parisujjhati".
snp1.10:184:
184
				"Saddhāya tarati oghaṁ, appamādena aṇṇavaṁ;
				Vīriyena dukkhamacceti,
				paññāya parisujjhati".
snp1.10:186:
186
			"Saddahāno arahataṁ, dhammaṁ nibbānapattiyā;
			Sussūsaṁ labhate paññaṁ,
			appamatto vicakkhaṇo.
snp1.10:187:
187
			Patirūpakārī dhuravā, uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṁ;
			Saccena kittiṁ pappoti,
			dadaṁ mittāni ganthati.
snp1.10:188:
188
			Yassete caturo dhammā, saddhassa gharamesino;
			Saccaṁ dhammo dhiti cāgo,
			sa ve pecca na socati.
snp1.10:189:
189
			Iṅgha aññepi pucchassu, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
			Yadi saccā damā cāgā,
			khantyā bhiyyodha vijjati".
snp1.10:190:
190
			"Kathaṁ nu dāni puccheyyaṁ, Puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
			Yohaṁ ajja pajānāmi,
			Yo attho samparāyiko.
snp1.10:191:
191
			Atthāya vata me buddho, Vāsāyāḷavimāgamā;
			Yohaṁ ajja pajānāmi,
			Yattha dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ.
snp1.10:192:
192
			So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, Gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
			Namassamāno sambuddhaṁ,
			Dhammassa ca sudhammatan"ti.
